name: Only Damage is Damage
description:
Only damage is damage! And you also got coins for dealing damage. Because all enemies are already dead the only way you can showing your DpS is by attacking a practice dummy. From your coins you can make "Pay2Win" to do even more damage (there is even an item called Pay2Win)! But watch out! If you don't hold yourself fit through dealing damage yourself, you will age and take damage yourself!

*This is my second released game ever. It's created within 10 days. Feel free to give any feedback you like.
